description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.qMe0vRfiZ3SAGjs4]{Paranormal Investigator}

Halve the time it takes you to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C#gather-information]{gather information} (minimum 30 minutes), @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.gZlg2ZKze0erNLmP#search]{search an area}, or perform research to take 20 when @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.VWJLbwCeu7DsunHk]{recalling knowledge} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.IdprCKGj66qptyN5]{identifying a creature}, a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.HXcmgteT2OegqFrB#identify-magic-item]{magic item}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.76u4HnGcAlySicb4#identify-technology]{technology}. In addition, once per day, if you fail a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.gZlg2ZKze0erNLmP]{Perception} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.nBrYkGfNBJAHe0xJ]{Sense Motive} check or a check in your field, you can reroll the check and use the higher result.
